{"step_by_step_thinking": "Hemodialysis-associated amyloidosis is a form of systemic amyloidosis associated with chronic kidney failure. The documents mention that the amyloid protein associated with this condition is beta-2 microglobulin. This protein accumulates in the blood of patients undergoing long-term hemodialysis because it is unable to cross the dialysis filter.", "answer_choice": "C. b- 2 microglobulin"}
